David Letterman 's gaffe occur? Obviously, David Letterman 's writers blew it when they fed him a joke that was not only, by his own admission, in poor taste, but factually wrong. His Monday apology( It's my fault that it was misunderstood ) made it clear their joke was not fact-checked-- the only Sarah Palin daughter in New York City last week was 14. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
